library(lme4)
library(ggplot2)

library(stringr)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggpubr)
library(gridExtra)
library(tidyverse)

library(vip)

```{r}
new_format_spr_data<- read_csv("/Users/noa/Workspace/lasso_positions_sampling_results/new_format_spr.csv") %>%
  mutate(actucal_sample_pct =case_when(sample_pct>=0.2 ~ 0.2, sample_pct>=0.15 ~0.15, sample_pct>=0.1 ~ 0.1, sample_pct>=0.05 ~ 0.05) ,
                                delta_ll_first_phase = ifelse(rf_dist_first_phase>0,naive_SPR_ll-lasso_SPR_first_phase_ll,0), delta_ll_second_phase = ifelse(rf_dist_second_phase>0,naive_SPR_ll-lasso_SPR_second_phase_ll,0), spr_neighbours = 2*(n_seq-3)*((2*n_seq)- 7), run_time_lasso =  actucal_sample_pct*lasso_SPR_first_phase_spr_moves+ (60/spr_neighbours)*(lasso_SPR_second_phase_spr_moves), run_time_full = naive_SPR_spr_moves ) 


new_format_spr_data %>% group_by(actucal_training_size, actucal_sample_pct) %>% summarise(median_first_phase = median(delta_ll_first_phase),max_first_phase = max(delta_ll_first_phase), median_second_phase = median (delta_ll_second_phase), max_second_phase = max (delta_ll_second_phase), median_run_time_factor = median(run_time_full/run_time_lasso) )

new_format_spr_data %>% filter (actucal_training_size==400, new_format_spr_data$rf_dist_second_phase>0) 

```
